Salesforce Components - SendEmailTemplateService
Overview    Classes    Enums    Interfaces    Triggers    SObjects    Groups    Index




Class SendEmailTemplateService

public inherited sharing class SendEmailTemplateService
implements RestService

Service to send an email using a template called by the REST service class BlazeBiteIntegrationService.


Change History

- 08/29/2024   Initial version.

Group:
    Service Classes

Members

  Modifiers and Type Name Description
public static RestServiceResponse
execute(RestRequest req, String service)
Executes the sendEmail action in the REST service.

Methods

public static RestServiceResponse execute(
  RestRequest req,
  String service
)

Implements/Overrides: RestService.execute(RestRequest,String)

Executes the sendEmail action in the REST service.

Parameters:
    req – Request context variable to access and pass request data in this RESTful Apex method. Attributes supported in the JSON request body:
- emailTo: The email addresses to send the email to.
- emailCc: The email addresses to send a copy of the email to.
- emailBcc: The email addresses to send a blind copy of the email to.
- emailFrom: The email address to send the email from.
- replyTo: The email address to set as the reply-to address.
- subject: The subject of the email.
- htmlBody: The HTML body of the email.
- textBody: The text body of the email.
- venueId: The venue ID to relate the email to the account.
- restricted: If true, the email will not be related to any account nor contact.
    service – The service executed, fixed value "sendWelcomeEmail".

Returns:
    The response of the service.
